data.title: 113. 80s Synth Pop Volume 1 by The Mix Tape (Music and Pop Culture)
data.meta_description:
We begin our month of Synth and techno with our 80s mix. Synth pop was some of the best music ever to hit our ears and we’ll be taking you on a journey over the next few weeks starting here, at the
begining, and watching the magical shift to the techno of the early 2000’s
 
#Yaz, #InformationSociety #OMD #PetShopBoys #CrystalWaters and so much more!
 
Come on in and enjoy thus weeks 80s Synth Pop Mixtape
 
Please leave us a review wherever you listen to podcasts!
 
You can help the show by donating to our Buy Me a Coffee: The Mix Tape is Weekly Pop Culture Podcast (buymeacoffee.com)
 
 
Please visit our sponsor-
 www.BustedTees.com   At checkout use code JASON25945 To receive a fat discount
Follow us Online!
www.TheMixTapeShow.com
 
Join us on YouTube with all the Twisted Kid and Rewind Toy goodness you could want!
 Please take a moment to Subscribe: https://youtube.com/channel/UC01Q55dWT8mYLdjbP-x6GTQ

data.text:
Had the opportunity to sit with Will Turpin from the ever awesome band Collective Soul!

They are touring this summer and just released a new double album From here to Eternity available here https://collectivesoul.com/

On this BONUS episode of The Mix Tape we decided it would be fun to take a popular film franchise and recast it as if it were made today. On our first outing we tackle Indiana Jones and The Raiders of the Lost Ark!

We each made our picks, then tossed them all together and came up with our cast, but we would love to hear your thoughts!

#IndianaJones #RaidersOfTheLostArk #Recast #80s #80sMovies #HarrisonFord #Spielberg

www.TheMixTapeShow.com is the place to check out our Playlists, Interviews and more!

This weeks episode we are going to be discussing some of our favorite film scores so why not deliver a pre-show talking about some famous film composers first?

Look for the episode to be released this Wednesday!

Whoomp here it Is! Our interview with founding member of Tag Team DC Glenn.

Jump in as DC tells how Whoomp There it is found its start, how after 30 years they keep going, some of the bands they’ve played with and how he manages to stay relevant in todays world.

#TagTeam #Whoomp #DCGlenn #TheMixTape

Take a tour with K.C. Masterpeace www.AmericanLegacyTours.com Let K.C. lead you on a haunted adventure through the streets of Mt. Healthy (or he can show you the cool sights of Cincinnati, talk about beer and maybe take you into a crypt).

We’re taking another trip to Hip Hop land this week as we present another 80s Rap MixTape! We talk about Hip Hops first beef, we attempt to beat box like The Fat Boys, we discuss the story of break dancing and so much more!

#TheFatBoys #KurtisBlow #BeastieBoys #KoolMoeDee # LLCoolJ

On this very special episode of The Mix Tape we had the opportunity to chat with Kevin Eastman, one of the creators of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. He tells us what his favorite movie adaptation has been so far, how The Last Ronin came about, which Turtle best represents him and more!

#TMNT #KevinEastman #TeenageMutantNinjaTurltes #TheLastRonin

A special presentation,

If you are a fan of 80’s Cartoons, ESPESCIALLY Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, then this is the interview for you! We were blessed to have the opportunity to chat with the one and only Pat Fraley, the man who voiced Krang, Casey Jones and Baxter Stockman. He has worked on Disney’s TaleSpin, Toy Story, Denver the Last Dinosaur, Bravestarr, GI Joe and way too many more projects to list. Pat talks about his time as a voice actor, tells the story of his friend and neighbor Ed Asner and of course lets you know which Muppet he would be.

This one was so much fun and we hope you enjoy listening!

#PatFraley #TMNT #GIJoe #VoiceActor #Krang #TheMixTape #DenverTheLastDinosaur #TaleSpin #ToyStory
